logger.doc:name: Triggered getSysId subflow
Finished getSysId Request to ServiceNow
logger.message: Finished getSysId Request to ServiceNow. sys_id = #[vars.sys_id]

logger.doc:name: Finished GET ALL INCIDENTS Request. Preparing response
logger.message: Finished GET ALL INCIDENTS Request. Preparing response

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json var results = payload.body.getRecordsResponse --- results mapObject ( { "incident": { "incident_id": $.number, "sys_id": $.sys_id, "description": $.short_description, "state": $.incident_state, "priority": $.priority, "urgency": $.urgency, "impact": $.impact, "comments": $.comments_and_work_notes } } )

ee:transform.doc:name: Translate State, Urgency and Impact into strings

logger.doc:name: Received CREATE INCIDENT Request
logger.message: Received CREATE INCIDENT Request. Request Details = #[payload]

logger.doc:name: Finished CREATE INCIDENT Request. Preparing response
logger.message: Finished CREATE INCIDENT Request with the following details: sys_id=#[payload.body.insertResponse.sys_id], incident_id=#[payload.body.insertResponse.number] Preparing response.

set-payload.value: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "message": "Incident created successfully", "sys_id": payload.body.insertResponse.sys_id, "incident_id": payload.body.insertResponse.number }]
set-payload.doc:name: Set Response

logger.doc:name: Received GET INCIDENT BY ID Request
logger.message: Received GET INCIDENT BY ID Request. Incident ID = #[vars.incident_id]

logger.doc:name: Finished GET INCIDENT BY ID Request. Preparing Response
logger.message: Finished GET INCIDENT BY ID Request. Preparing Response. Incident ID = #[vars.incident_id]

ee:transform.doc:name: Translate State, Priority, Urgency and Impact into strings

logger.doc:name: Finished GET INCIDENT BY ID Request. Log Response
logger.message: Finished GET INCIDENT BY ID Request. Incident ID = #[vars.incident_id]. Response: #[payload]

logger.doc:name: Received MODIFY INCIDENT BY ID Request
logger.message: Received MODIFY INCIDENT BY ID Request. Incident ID = #[vars.incident_id]

logger.doc:name: Log Parameters of the Request
Finished MODIFY INCIDENT BY ID Request
logger.message: Finished MODIFY INCIDENT BY ID Request. Incident ID = #[vars.incident_id]

logger.doc:name: Received DELETE INCIDENT BY ID Request
logger.message: Received DELETE INCIDENT BY ID Request. Incident ID = #[vars.incident_id]

logger.doc:name: Sending DELETE INCIDENT BY ID Request to ServiceNow
logger.message: Sending DELETE INCIDENT BY ID Request to ServiceNow. Incident ID = #[vars.incident_id]

logger.doc:name: Finished DELETE INCIDENT BY ID Request
logger.message: Finished DELETE INCIDENT BY ID Request. Incident ID = #[vars.incident_id]

logger.doc:name: Received CLOSE INCIDENT BY ID Request
logger.message: Received CLOSE INCIDENT BY ID Request. Incident ID = #[vars.incident_id]

logger.doc:name: Log Parameters of the Request
logger.message: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "message": "Sending Close Incident Request to ServiceNow", "incident_id": vars.incident_id, "parameters": { "sys_id": vars.sys_id, "state": vars.state, "caller_id": vars.caller_id, "close_code": vars.close_code, "parent_incident": vars.parent_incident } }]

logger.doc:name: Finished CLOSE INCIDENT BY ID Request
logger.message: Finished CLOSE INCIDENT BY ID Request. Incident ID = #[vars.incident_id]
